author: admin
title: The green diet to fight cancer: what Kate Middleton eats and what she has to give up - Breaking Latest News
text:
The Duchess of Cambridge, Kate Middleton, has always been known for her dedication to maintaining a healthy lifestyle through regular physical activity and a balanced diet. However, following her recent diagnosis of cancer, her diet has become even more crucial to supporting her health during preventive chemotherapy treatments.
In order to combat her illness and support her body through this challenging time, doctors have recommended that Kate follow a ‘green diet’. This diet focuses on consuming foods that are rich in antioxidants and unsaturated fats, while avoiding processed foods, sugars, and alcoholic beverages.
As part of her new dietary regimen, Kate will need to eliminate packaged foods, fast food, and reduce her intake of dairy products, gluten, and carbohydrates. Instead, she will incorporate healthier options such as sweet potatoes, quinoa, buckwheat flour, brown rice, oily fish, nuts, and lean sources of protein.
By making these dietary adjustments, Kate hopes to enhance her immune defenses and improve her overall well-being as she undergoes treatment. Despite the challenges ahead, the Duchess remains committed to prioritizing her health and fighting her illness with the support of her loved ones.
